com.ulflander.application.model
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.application.model.Text
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chapter, Document, Paragraph, Sentence, Token
public abstract class Text
extends Object

Text is the base class for any text model: document, paragraph, token...

Since:
2/23/14
Author:
Ulflander

isUppercased

public final Boolean isUppercased()
Expose whether raw text is all uppercased.

Returns:
True if no lowercase letter is in raw string, false otherwise

Returns:

Expose whether raw text is all lowercased.

Returns:
